description: Try our easy to follow 15-Minute Udon Noodle Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: 15-Minute Udon Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring 1.5 litres water to the boil in a large saucepan. Stir in miso paste and ginger and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add broccolini stems and cabbage and simmer for 3 minutes. Add noodles, remaining broccolini and spring onions, reserving some for garnish. Simmer for 2 minutes. Season with soy and sesame oil.

Meanwhile, add vinegar to a saucepan of boiling water. Reduce heat to a fast simmer. Crack an egg into a cup. Stir water to create a whirlpool and slide egg into swirling water. Repeat with a second egg. Simmer eggs for 2-3 minutes until white is firm. Use a slotted spoon to transfer to a plate. Repeat with remaining eggs.
Ladle soup into bowls, top each with an egg and garnish with remaining spring onion.
